contentrichtext.text: '''Centreville''' may refer to places: ;Canada *[[Centreville, New Brunswick]] *[[Centreville, Newfoundland and Labrador]] *[[Centreville, Nova Scotia (disambiguation)]] *[[Centreville, Elgin County, Ontario]] (now known as West Elgin) *[[Centreville, Grey County, Ontario]] *[[Centreville, Lennox and Addington County, Ontario]] *[[Centreville Amusement Park]] (on Toronto Islands, Ontario) *[[Centreville, British Columbia]] - ghost town ;United States *[[Centreville, Alabama]] *Centreville, former name of [[Centerville, Fremont, California]] *[[Centreville, Delaware]] *[[Centreville, Illinois]] *[[Centreville, Maryland]] *[[Centreville, Michigan]] *[[Centreville, Mississippi]] *[[Centreville, Virginia]] *Centreville, now part of [[Bethlehem, Pennsylvania]] *Centreville, the original name of the village of [[Penns Creek, Pennsylvania]] ==See also== *[[Centerville (disambiguation)]] {{geodis}}
